metadata.title: USN-6298-1 -- ZZIPlib vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Liu Zhu discovered that ZZIPlib incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2018-7727)  YiMing Liu discovered that ZZIPlib incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2020-18442)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6298-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2+esm1 libzzip-dev - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2+esm1 libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
